summary: 1995 JEEP CHEROKEE 4.0L. REPLACED THE EXHAUST MANIFOLD AT A COST OF $475.00 DUE TO A CRACK FOUND IN THE MANIFOLD DURING A REQUIRED STATE VEHICLE INSPECTION. THE REPAIR SHOP PERSONNEL INDICATED THAT THIS IS BECOMING ALMOST ROUTINE FOR THIS MODEL VEHICLE PRIOR TO A REDESIGN OF THE MANIFOLD BY THE MANUFACTURER. *JB
